ModMetaData.name: BattIePatch: Ghoul Mood Bar Shows Their Hunger
ModMetaData.author: BattIeBear
ModMetaData.description:
V1.6
The mood bar being part of vanilla portraits is a massive improvement, however it is completely useless for the new type of pawn included in Anomaly: Ghouls.
This mod simply makes Ghouls' mood bar display their hunger instead, as this is more useful and saves you the time of having to manually check each Ghoul to see if they are starving.
